website_summaries.verdict: A long-lasting concealer with many different shade options to match every skin tone.
pros: Provides some moisture, so great for dry skin
Easy to apply and blends seamlessly into skin
cons: Coverage is fairly light, so not ideal for those looking for more coverage

customer_reviews.title: The concealer I reach for when dealing with a blemish.
customer_reviews.text: Revlon makes true "color stay" makeup. So many other product lines say they are color stay, but Revlon products really last all day. And this concealer is no exception. While most makeup will work for little imperfections, this is the concealer I reach for when dealing with a blemish. It doesn't dry it out causing it to get flaky, buy it isn't oily either causing it to wipe off easily. It covers blemishes with without making them even worse. And it works really well when used with Revlon's color-stay foundation. Been using the two for years and they work awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Where the Sidewalk Ends

customer_reviews.title: Best concealer
customer_reviews.text: My favorite concealer of all time. I bought a MAC one thinking it would be better, but it’s still sitting in my makeup bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie B

customer_reviews.title: No dry, flakiness or creasing!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t belive I finally found a concealer that doesn’t make my eyes look super dry and cracked. Very very little creasing AND THE BEST PART... actually covered my very dark circles really well and lasted all day long! I’m so ecstatic. I’ve wasted so much money on concealers and trying techniques to keep my concealer from creasing and something that actually covered my dark circles. Very thankful I came across this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jj

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Covers up those little spots and blemishes nicely before putting on makeup. I actually seldom wear makeup anymore unless going out for "special" occasions and the concealer is all I need to be okay and feel like I look okay.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Rigsby

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: This concealer is the only type I use. Great coverage, doesn't make my face greasy or feel caked on. Helps with pimples and matches my skin tone well. I've used it for many, many years and have no reason to use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: mamaknowsbest

customer_reviews.title: Not right for me
customer_reviews.text: I used this concealer for a month and my eyes started watering like crazy. First, I thought it was allergies, as I'm always trying new products and wasn't paying much attention. Then I thought it was my mascara, as I have never had any problems with a concealer. I got to the point that I was literally tearing up non stop and was going to see a doctor. Then it donned on me that It could be the concealer (duh). I stopped using it and the tearing stopped immediately. Be aware.
customer_reviews.author: H. Auerbach

customer_reviews.title: Sets well. Slight creasing.
customer_reviews.text: Stays on well. Have to set with powder or it creases.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda L. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome concealer
customer_reviews.text: This concealer works great. I only have to apply it once in the morning and it doesn't come off very much during the day. I use it to hide my acne scars and so far it is the only concealer that lasts long and doesn't cause me to break out more.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Rose

customer_reviews.title: Best under eye and dark spot concealer
customer_reviews.text: I use this under my eyes and on a couple of melanoma spots. I've tried other brands, but this one is just the right consistency, and when I blit it slightly with my fingers to spread it smoothly does not stick or clump as some others do. After it dries, I then use Revlon color stay makeup and I no longer have dark circles under my eyes or spots on my face! I've been using this for a few years now.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Covers Dark Circles and Doesn't Cake up
customer_reviews.text: Covers dark circles and doesn't cake up. I have used some really pricey products and am shocked at how smooth and effective this is! I will be buying again. My only complaint is that this company is not animal friendly :( It matters! Get on board already Revlon. People like me spend a LOT more money on products that frankly don't necessarily work as well because we "feel better" about it ethically.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes when I ordered this. The color was off and it seemed a bit old. One thing that "threw" me was that the concealer came wrapped in CVS drugstore packaging. It almost felt black market. I won't be ordering from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice concealer
customer_reviews.text: This is a good concealer but it loses some of its staying power as the day goes on. It gives great coverage and the first 3-4 hours looks great! Then my dark circles start to show a bit.
customer_reviews.author: chris baker

customer_reviews.title: very light coverage
customer_reviews.text: Blendable and easy to apply. However, it has light coverage and you might want to reapply it during the hot summer months.
customer_reviews.author: Claire (bookscoffeeandrepeat)

customer_reviews.title: Best concealer I’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best concealer I’ve ever used. Blends beautifully with any makeup. Doesn’t leave any border lines or difference since it smooths out so well. I’ll never buy any other. Highly recommend, just make absolutely sure you have the right color match to your own skin color. It’s wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Cinderella

customer_reviews.title: Super good and works!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t bust your wallet and it works! Imagine that...a reasonably priced concealer that you don’t have to pay big bucks for! I’ve added this to my subscribe subscriptions so it now ships regularly to me. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Terr W

customer_reviews.title: Not blemish concealer/ it’s plain concealer
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT blemish concealer as described. It’s does not have salicylic acid for blemishes as described. This is a different product than blemish concealer. It’s just regular concealer. Very deceiving in description, still waiting to hear from seller for refund/ return.
customer_reviews.author: NLC

customer_reviews.title: This Concealer Is Fake News.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always used this concealer but this one feels super tacky and sticky, and dries up the area I put it in (while staying tacky and tight) immediately. Feels like a knock off. Throwing it away.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Best Concealer Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Revlon Colorstay Concealer for years now, and I love it so much, that I will not use any other concealer! It goes on very smoothly, and it stays on until you remove it. The concealer blends very smoothly into your skin, making it look very natural. I highly recommend Revlon Colorstay Concealer!
customer_reviews.author: TFD

customer_reviews.title: Runny and not much coverage.
customer_reviews.text: Kind of runny and not very good coverage. It took a lot of it to "conceal" anything. It burned a little around my eyes as well. I guess its good if you dont want much coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Foxys' Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Concealer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cheap concealer, I use it every single day. It’s a thinner consistently and kind of harder to blend than most, but for the price and the amount that you get I don’t mind taking an extra minute to blend better.
customer_reviews.author: Momma702

customer_reviews.title: The ones from Amazon were dried out, not useable. Fantastic product but buy it locally!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best concealer ever. It will make you look 10 years younger. BUT the concealer I bought on Amazon must've been years old from some closed out store or something, because half of them were DRY! Like, the makeup in side was cracked and you could only get three applications out of the entire bottle. Will not order from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Oakland Citizen

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: My dark circles were completely covered by using this concealer. BUUUT after 2 uses it started leaking out the packaging, caused in my make up bag a total mess and it is not broken at all. It seemed not like original product.
customer_reviews.author: Franciskf

customer_reviews.title: Not what was ordered
customer_reviews.text: This is full coverage concealer not the one with salicylic acid that was the one purchased.
customer_reviews.author: 2bar_a

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Great cover on facial redness and imperfections. Long lasting. Good color match for my skin
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: Relationship ruining
customer_reviews.text: This concelaer didn't conceal anything. Infact it just made my face all splochy. My boyfriend thinks i'm ugly and he was going to propose but now he id dating my sister.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Blake

customer_reviews.title: This product is good for teenagers
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes his product because it works. And the quality is good also
customer_reviews.author: cynthia sefick

customer_reviews.title: Not the regular color of Medium!
customer_reviews.text: If you are used to using the Medium color this will be too light for you!
customer_reviews.author: gsl8911

customer_reviews.title: Very cakey
customer_reviews.text: Gets very cakey and thick when I use it under my eyes. Also very drying to my eyes. Works okay to cover acne, but definitely not under the eyes for dark circles.
customer_reviews.author: Mariposa

customer_reviews.title: Def worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for awhile, it works well with my skin
customer_reviews.author: Valarie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Revlon ColorStay is hands-down the best and this concealer works very well with the liquid foundation and lasts all day. No smudging and no creasing. Great value, too!
customer_reviews.author: Cgmo

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: very dry like it was very old. Had to add water. Still did not like
customer_reviews.author: RoseAnne Grigsby

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick!
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel to this, and it smoothes out well.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Oosterveen

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well.
customer_reviews.text: It works with my skin tone which was hard to find. It works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Basic concealer that really stays put
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for years. Application is easy, quick. It's one and done.
customer_reviews.author: Monika

customer_reviews.title: Great concealer!
customer_reviews.text: Not heavy looking or feeling, but it still conceals blemishes and dark circles very well. I like it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Very moist, maybe too moist for some.
customer_reviews.text: Too moist in that it sort of smears. I have yet in expensive or not expensive concealkers have yet to find great . Great I would pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Celia Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Old and expired
customer_reviews.text: I think this item was expired by the time I purchased it. It instantly dries up my skin and does not absorb it like the one I purchased from the store.
customer_reviews.author: Nelly

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I wear this often, but buy it in the store. My first time buying it on Amazon. I received this product and it is completely runny all over the stick. Not sure why or what happened. But it's disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Miss M

customer_reviews.title: It works as well as more expensive products.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't crease. It last all day and makes you look refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mero

customer_reviews.title: Best product for the money
customer_reviews.text: It is a necessary part of my daily routine. It tends to fade with perspiration requiring reapplication. It is the best product for the money I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Howell Kupish

customer_reviews.title: not too shabby! :)
customer_reviews.text: This is fairly easy to apply, has decent coverage, matches pretty well, and stays longer than my previous concealer. So far, I am very pleased with this stuff! :)
customer_reviews.author: talijane

customer_reviews.title: Revlon Colorstay
customer_reviews.text: The Colorstay line from Revlon can not be beat. The packaging says it all. I can no longer purchase this specific product in the drugstore which is a shame. In today's society what is new is hot, and some really good products fall by the wayside.
customer_reviews.author: elaineH-M

customer_reviews.title: Good Coverage
customer_reviews.text: This concealer lasts all day and does not look too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: A. Tee

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for someone who needed it but...
customer_reviews.text: It was very yellow in tone. I noticed and she didn't until she really looked in a mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Eyesopen

customer_reviews.title: ... product for a while now and it is a great concealer.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for a while now and it is a great concealer.
customer_reviews.author: Professor Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: A must keep
customer_reviews.text: I always go back to this concealer even after trying more expensive items. It works and stays on.
customer_reviews.author: P. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Best Concealer Out There!
customer_reviews.text: Stays without creasing or caking. Seriously my favorite concealer...and I've tried TOO MANY to count over the years!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: The best concealer
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried different concealers and always felt that they aged my skin terribly or wore off throughout the day but this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: I have always used Revlon Colorstay products and I will ...
customer_reviews.text: I have always used Revlon Colorstay products and I will as long as they are around! I also do make up so if a color doesnt match me it goes into my kit!
customer_reviews.author: Thalia D.

customer_reviews.title: Fake!
customer_reviews.text: This is not the real product. Bottle it comes in is different and the color is extremely off. Will never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Color is nice. It seems to last all day as well. I don’t like how powder looks over it on its own, I have to have foundation
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Williams

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find it in the stores. I love this product. So when saw that Amazon had it. I was happy. I hope you keep this product in store. Because I plan to buy more. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Geo

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME VALUE!
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite go to concealer!! Great value on Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Lasts all day,  good color
customer_reviews.text: I really like this color and the coverage it provides. My only issue is that I got it to use as a contour shade and it can be very difficult to blend. With patience I make it work though. It also lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Coty Smercina

customer_reviews.title: I have used this product for ages and love it! It is reasonable and works much better ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for ages and love it! It is reasonable and works much better than expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Stewart

customer_reviews.title: medium to high coverage
customer_reviews.text: It came with the same request, great product, nice coverage, medium to high coverage
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. Good coverage that lasts for ours. I use on my arms, which are perpetually beat up.
customer_reviews.author: K. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: It is an excellent concealer for oily skin type :)
customer_reviews.text: This product will hide the discolored spots in the skin and also it can be replaced the foundation :)
customer_reviews.author: Noor95

customer_reviews.title: Stays on!
customer_reviews.text: I love this and I've worn it for many years!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Chrzan

customer_reviews.title: This is a really great concealer if you have extremely fair skin
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great concealer if you have extremely fair skin, as I do. I particularly like it for the under eye area, as it goes on very smoothly and provides good coverage for dark circles.
customer_reviews.author: D Walker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love revlon products and have not been disappointed by Amazon......
customer_reviews.author: kimberly grant

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it & great low price. Cheaper than Walmart and Walgreens. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok but not great
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely dark circles and dark pigmentation from past breakouts, even though I’m very pale skinned. It doesn’t cancel these areas out as much as I need it to. I’m still on the hunt for an amazing drug store concealer. I just can’t afford to always buy the 30.00 brand I love.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Traffanstedt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product... I really like it u can see a huge difference...
customer_reviews.author: Shilky prabhakar

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I use Revlon all the time over all the other brands. Matches my skin tone better than the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Good concealer - long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I have a birthmark on my face that is VERY hard to conceal. This product conceals very well, and doesn't come off during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Hides Blemishes
customer_reviews.text: I have used Revlon colorstay concealer for years and it's getting harder to find. The color is perfect for my complexion and blends very well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not the worst, but certainly could have done better
customer_reviews.text: First of all the seller, "ABETRADES" is a psycho path. He/she sent me an email complaining about the negative feedback I left on their page. They even replied to my message with some nonsense that didn't even make sense; if you visit their page you will see what I'm talking about. Terrible, terrible service and will NEVER buy from them again simply because they like to harass people who don't give them positive feedback. As for the actual product, it was advertised as something completely different than what I received... and anyway, it isn't my shade and it creases. Worst buying experience ever.
customer_reviews.author: materialgrl

customer_reviews.title: I returned one for a refund after it went up ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned one for a refund after it went up in flames on the top which burned my index finger on left hand.
customer_reviews.author: DEE E.

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: This stuff does what it says. It basically does not wear off or fade. I got it for some theatrical work that made me sweat my makeup off. This stuff did not fade, get weaker or rub off until I went at it with a makeup removing wipe. Note: It's definitely thicker-feeling when you put it on, so you have to get used to spreading it and blending it on your face. But this has been one of the few makeup products I've used that lives up to the hype.
customer_reviews.author: C. Clonts

customer_reviews.title: My personal favorite
customer_reviews.text: There is something about this concealer that just really works for me, even when I'm more tan or pale than usual. I personally prefer it to my other more expensive sephora brands. I highly reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Dellacroce

customer_reviews.title: I would give it 5 stars if it didn't burn ...
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 5 stars if it didn't burn the skin under my eyes for the first week that I used it. I've never had make-up do that to me before. It went away after a few uses (adjustment period I guess?), but I almost threw it away because of the awful stinging pain it caused. The coverage is decent and I only have to apply once in the morning and maybe a second touch-up later in the evening. I use a silicone blender sponge to apply it and it works very well with it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Well I did some research and a few websites said this product is comparable to Lancome concearer... it is not, lol. But I will say it is a good product for the price. Really my only gripe is it is a bit cakey. I doubt use it as concealer anymore. Now I add it to my bbq cream for a little added coverage, and i really like it. Cuts red nicely applies rather evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Beware - knockoff product
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware! This is NOT Revlon. It is a knockoff. Product and packaging does not match authentic makeup. Color doesn't even match. Who knows what mystery ingredients it may contain. Use at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: StellarBlueJay

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't cake
customer_reviews.text: I tried a lot of concealers before I found one that doesn't cake or make you look wrinkled. Love this one!
customer_reviews.author: Speterman

customer_reviews.title: Too pale, more color fair than light
customer_reviews.text: Great product only the color " light" is actually fair!!! Too pale for my pretty light skin, had to order light/medium instead!!!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline victory

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage, blends well
customer_reviews.text: I stopped using foundation and use only this and Almay CC Cream (I use moisturizer and CC cream all over first, then touch up a couple areas with this concealer and blend with concealer brush - Ecotools brushes are great.) No more eye creases from foundation, better moisturizing and sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: ljdbs

customer_reviews.title: Use as a liquid highlighter.
customer_reviews.text: This concealor gives light coverage and it made my eye makeup travel down a bit, I use Urban Decay eye primer so that shouldn't have happened. I did find that it makes a great highlighter, no shimmer like most powders have. So I use it at the top of my cheekbones and outer corners of my eyes over or blended into my foundation with a brush and it looks natural and pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Paige

customer_reviews.title: Delivers on its longevity - better than department store brands!
customer_reviews.text: This is as good as any department store brand, believe me, I’ve tried most! The longevity is awesome! Will last and last until you remove it. I work 16 hour shifts on the regular an this never melts of or fades.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Dried Out
customer_reviews.text: Received product and contents are totally dried out. It was sealed, so I'm not sure if it's just old or was stored improperly or what. Unfortunately in its current state it is unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Divine Seven

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I used to use this concealer. Don't remember why I switched. It's absolutely perfect. It covers well. It lasts. Reckons Colorstay products are great.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie Rickman

customer_reviews.title: Decent Product
customer_reviews.text: This is good concealer. It’s hard to buy make up online when you’re not sure of the shade you need. I guessed right. The coverage is good.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Rose

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for years and always bought at a store. Started buying from Amazon, but the product doesn't seem right, very watery; had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: A little too light, but good coverage
customer_reviews.text: Took a risk buying a shade online without seeing it in person first. Turned out to be too light, but not so light that I can't use it. Coverage is good and stays put throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Hern

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a coverup that doesn’t dry the skin and this product works great.

customer_reviews.title: Throw one in your bag for touch ups.
customer_reviews.text: I have very, very fair skin. This is my go to for touch ups throughout the day, the "lip gloss" style brush wand makes it easy to apply on the go. It is fairly lightweight and liquidy, works best when patted into skin. It is also suitable for under eye concealing, not too opaque or cakey.

customer_reviews.title: favorite concealer
customer_reviews.text: it doesn’t blend easily but if your face is moisturized before application it works great
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: No Salicylic Acid
customer_reviews.text: Product does NOT contain salicylic acid. Need better description in advertising.

customer_reviews.title: Best concealer ever
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this for years!!! I like to think of it as my little secret. You can swim and it stays on, last the whole day!! I’ll die if they ever stop making it!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Doss

customer_reviews.title: Best concealer for under the eyes.
customer_reviews.text: I use it exclusively for under my eyes and it is better than anything else I've ever found. The price is right too !

customer_reviews.text: I ordered for a under eye concealer and it doesn't really do the trick

customer_reviews.text: I don’t use this as it’s consistency is thicker and color not right lightness!

customer_reviews.title: Great concealer.
customer_reviews.text: This is not meant to moisturize. It is more of a spot or under eye concealer. For me, it is a great value as it lasts about a year.

customer_reviews.title: Great undereye coverage
customer_reviews.text: I almost bought a $25 concealer but got this instead. So glad I saved my money!

customer_reviews.text: The item is not right color and it's hard to find your exact match.. Thank you for refund.I'll try to pass it to someone who can.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The package was really hard to get off, the lightest shade is still to dark for me.

customer_reviews.title: Quality fits the price
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy higher end skin cosmetics but was feeling cheap...my mistake.
customer_reviews.author: MelanieP

customer_reviews.title: it really works
customer_reviews.text: I like this so much I'm going to buy another one, it really works so well on me.
customer_reviews.author: wanda howerton

customer_reviews.title: Good price and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good match for my skin color and doesn’t look caked.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Cooley

customer_reviews.title: For very light skin
customer_reviews.text: Best concealer for me. Perfect shade for my pale skin
customer_reviews.author: christina

product_meta.title: Revlon ColorStay Concealer, Longwearing Full Coverage Color Correcting Makeup, 015 Light, 0.21 oz
product_meta.description:
Color:LightThe Revlon ColorStay Concealer is the latest ColorStay concealer with new time release technology covers imperfections for a continuous, flawless look that lasts for up to 24 hours. Perfectly formulated to cover skin imperfections while concealing blemishes and dark circles. Provides full yet undetectable coverage. Use the applicator tip to gently dab concealer where needed and build coverage until desired level is reached. Available in multiple shades. Revlon is a global leader in cosmetics, hair color, fragrances, skincare, and beauty care products. One of the strongest consumer brand franchises in the world, Revlon’s products are sold in over 100 countries across six continents. Revlon revitalized the industry over the years with iconic nail and lip colors and with breakthrough technology like ColorStay transfer-resistant lipstick and makeup.

BRAND STORY
By Revlon
feature_bullets: Formulated to cover imperfections and conceal blemishes and dark circles
Time-release technology balances imperfections for a continuously flawless look that wears up to 24 hours
Available in a variety of shades

Using the wand tip, dab on this long-wearing concealer. To blend, gently pat it in with your ring finger (the pros never use a pointer, FYI, because it's too easy to apply too much pressure and smear away your concealer). Build until you have as much coverage as you want

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
